text:
Hi,

After Bug 15050 is fixed,I tried to make a sheet with HSSFWorkbook#cloneSheet() 
cheerfully,and I found a problem.We can't create a row(with HSSFSheet#createRow
()) to the sheet made by HSSFWorkbook#cloneSheet().
creator: kamoshida.toshiaki@future.co.jp
kamoshida.toshiaki@future.co.jp
text:
Created attachment 5687
A simple testcase to find it.NullPointerException is caused at line22.

creator: poi-support@buni.org
text:
help its attack of the clones!  He has a test case.  This is a good bug.  I'm on
the fence as to whether its serious enough to hold up 2.0.  I'm erring on the
side of yes because he submits test cases.... :-)
